title: Winter Windows 2025 unveiled on Oxford Street
excerpt: A luminous trail of heritage-inspired displays celebrates artisans and makers across the district.
author: OSDC Communications
body:
OSDC is delighted to unveil the Winter Windows for 2025 — a celebration of craft, commerce and community.

From marble inlays to hand-gilded type, the displays nod to the street’s storied past while looking to its sustainable future.

title: Pilot pedestrian-priority weekend continues
excerpt: Safer, cleaner and more enjoyable — the pilot expands eastward following strong public feedback.
author: OSDC Transport
body: Following successful trials, the OSDC will extend pedestrian-priority weekends to include key junctions.

title: Q4 applications open for Heritage Shopfront Grants
excerpt: Independent retailers can apply for matched funding to restore historic façades and signage.
author: OSDC Regeneration
body: Our Heritage Shopfront Grants support restoration of traditional materials and craftsmanship.
